solidstack.io
Interface SourceReader

All Known Implementing Classes:
RandomAccessSourceReader, ReaderSourceReader
public interface SourceReader

A source reader.

Author:
René M. de Bloois

Method Summary
 void close()
          Close the reader.
 String getEncoding()
          Returns the character encoding of the source.
 int getLineNumber()
          Returns the current line number.
 SourceLocation getLocation()
           
 Resource getResource()
           
 int read()
          Reads a character.
 String readLine()
          Reads the next line from the source.
 

Method Detail

close

void close()
Close the reader.

readLine

String readLine()
Reads the next line from the source. The current line number is incremented.

Returns:
The next line or null of there are no more lines to be read.

getLineNumber

int getLineNumber()
Returns the current line number. The current line number is the line that is about to be read with readLine() or is being read with read().

Returns:
The current line number.

read

int read()
Reads a character. Carriage return characters (\r) are filtered out:
  • \r\n becomes \n
  • \r without \n becomes \n

Returns:
A character. A carriage return is never returned.

getResource

Resource getResource()
Returns:
The underlying resource.

getLocation

SourceLocation getLocation()
Returns:
The current location.

getEncoding

String getEncoding()
Returns the character encoding of the source.

Returns:
The character encoding of the source.
